summary: Frontend testing completed for Aikido@Game Virtual Dojo validation messages. All 5 test cases PASSED. The welcome message is pedagogical and adapted for children 6-14 years, correctly mentions parent validation for digital games, and the 'Exercices au Dojo' tab clearly shows self-validation by the child. No mention of sensei/teacher as validator for digital games.

issues: DialogContent accessibility warning - missing DialogTitle for screen readers (console warning) - already has VisuallyHidden wrapper but warning persists

context_for_next_testing_agent: Virtual Dojo validation messages testing complete. All messages correctly mention: 1) Parent validation for digital games, 2) Self-validation by child for dojo exercises, 3) No mention of sensei/teacher as validator.
